column4: does anyone know how to code drivers?  or find some hidden drivers that i cant? >_<
i cant find a driver for my wireless adapter
check the url from ubotu, see if it's listed as supported
you should have recieved a private message from ubotu
Hmmm I don't know that card, so I don't know if it's supported, but it doesn't look good
sorry, its not a card..its an external usb adapter
so if its not on those lists, theres no way i can get it to work?  not even if i can find someone to write a driver?
no-one will "write a driver for you", it's not a 10 minute job
i know that...but there are those that may
there is not, if no driver exists, it's probably because it needs to be reverse engineered
